channel.title: Minor water glitch in Residue Processing
channel.description:
Right after you exit the pipe in the beginning of this level, if you stand at a particular position and look at the right angle, you'll see that the water puddle nearby will have the skybox texture: [img]https://imageshack.us/a/img850/5821/hl22012091712192634.png[/img] [img]https://imageshack.us/a/img685/3932/hl22012091712192438.png[/img]
Video demonstration: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R_tPiZuDqpU[/url]
All settings maxed out except AA which is disabled. Also tried lowering shader, water reflection, shadow and disable HDR but the problem still exist.
map: bm_c2a4a setpos: -2005.734985 -655.657288 -122.995560;setang 2.471316 64.932190 0.000000
